officialTitle: Effects of Multifactorial Intervention on Type 2 Diabetes - A Multicenter, Open-Label, Randomized, Parallel Controlled, Community Trial.
inclusionCriteria:
1. 35-75 years old;
2. diagnosed as type 2 diabetes according to the criteria of the World Health Organization in 1999.
* Must have minimum age of 35 Years
* Must have maximum age of 75 Years
